page.title: 20STATION STORES,NEWNHAM
page.content: THE SHOP IS IN WHAT WAS THE BOOKING HALL OF THE OLD NEWNHAM G.W.R. RAILWAY STATION, ON THE TENBURY TO SEVERN VALLEY LINE.MR AND MRS DOYLE BOUGHT THE PROPERTY IN 1983.IT WAS DERELICT AND HAD BEEN UNOCCUPIED SINCE THE CLOSURE OF THE STATION IN 1964. THEY RESTORED AND EXTENDED THE STATION MASTER'S HOUSE ADJOINING THE BOOKING HALL,AND UNEARTHED THE OPPOSITE LENGTH OF PLATFORM.THEY HAVE WEATHER PROOFED THE TWO WAITING ROOMS ON THAT SIDE AND WILL EVENTUALLY PUT THEM INTO USE.MRS DOYLE IS A KEEN GARDENER AND THEY HAVE A FLOURISHING GARDEN CENTRE ON THE REST OF THE OLD STATION SITE. THEY ARE OPEN 7 DAYS A WEEK 8 AM TO 7PM AND SELL GROCERIES, SWEETS, ICE CREAM AND 'EVERYTHING AND ANY THING'.AN OLD SIGNAL ON THE PLATFORM ,WHICH CAN BE SEEN WELL FROM THE ROAD, SHOWS WHETHER THEY ARE OPEN OR CLOSED.
